channel.title: Error_Game_Invalidhost
channel.description:
Hello, first of all I am using the source located here:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657559.0.html
Here is a screenshot of the error.
http://prntscr.com/3n0g1b
Ok, so basically whenever I change the host IP from 127.0.0.1 it gives me this error.
I put the server onto my VPS and It does not connect at all, but I have another source on there that runs and connects perfectly.
If anyone could help me out it would be very appreciated.
